pushtowatch: Shown on the page footer, followed by an <input> element where you can enter the target user's user name to add a page to their watchlist
pushtowatch-email-body:
The body of the email message that PushToWatch sends to both the target user (the user to whose watchlist a page was pushed) and the person who pushed the page. The email subject message is {{msg-mw|pushtowatch-email-subject}}.
Parameters:
* $1 - target user's user name
* $2 - user name of the person who pushed the page to another user's watchlist
* $3 - full URL to the page that was pushed to the target's watchlist
pushtowatch-email-subject:
Title of the email that PushToWatch sends to both the target user (the user to whose watchlist a page was pushed) and the person who pushed the page. The email body message is {{msg-mw|pushtowatch-email-body}}.
Parameters:
* $1 - title of the page that was pushed to the target user's watchlist
pushtowatch-error:
Error message shown when the page could not be pushed to the given user's watchlist for whatever reason.
Parameters:
* $1 - the user name of the target user
pushtowatch-followers:
Shown on the page footer of a page.
Parameters:
* $1 - comma-separated list of users who have the current page on their watchlist
pushtowatch-no-followers: Shown on the page footer of a page when no-one on the wiki has the page on their watchlist
